statements: SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring
SELECT id, company_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceMonitoring
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant'
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE regulatory_requirements IS NOT NULL
SELECT company_name AS Company, compliance_status AS Status FROM ComplianceMonitoring
SELECT id, company_name FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY company_name DESC
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE regulatory_requirements LIKE '%audit%' OR regulatory_requirements LIKE '%report%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT company_name, regulatory_requirements FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' OR compliance_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY regulatory_requirements ASC, company_name ASC
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY compliance_status ASC
SELECT id, company_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status, id FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_name, deadline, description FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT id, deadline, requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT id, company_name FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, requirement_name, deadline FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31' AND requirement_name LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring JOIN regulatory_requirements ON compliance_monitoring.id = regulatory_requirements.id WHERE regulatory_requirements.deadline < NOW();
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE company_name LIKE '%Corp%' AND compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRequirements;
SELECT id, requirement_name FROM ComplianceRequirements WHERE due_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM ComplianceRequirements WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, violation_date FROM ComplianceViolations ORDER BY violation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRequirements ORDER BY requirement_name DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT r.requirement_name, c.record_date, v.violation_details FROM ComplianceRequirements r, ComplianceRecords c, ComplianceViolations v WHERE r.id = c.requirement_id AND c.id = v.record_id;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceViolations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND violation_details LIKE '%failed%';

SELECT r.requirement_name, COUNT(v.id) AS total_violations FROM ComplianceRequirements r LEFT JOIN (ComplianceRecords c JOIN ComplianceViolations v ON c.id = v.record_id) ON r.id = c.requirement_id GROUP BY r.requirement_name ORDER BY total_violations DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_team;
SELECT team_name, supervisor_id, team_member_id FROM monitoring_team ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_member_id, team_name FROM monitoring_team WHERE supervisor_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_checks FROM compliance_checks;
SELECT report_id, violation_description FROM violation_reports WHERE violation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM monitoring_team WHERE supervisor_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, supervisor_id, team_member_id FROM monitoring_team WHERE team_name LIKE '%Compliance%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks ORDER BY check_id DESC;
SELECT violation_description, violation_date FROM violation_reports WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT agency_name, regulation_desc FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_name = 'FDA';
SELECT check_id, check_name FROM compliance_checks;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_level FROM regulations;
SELECT category_id, category_name, category_description FROM compliance_categories;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name, entity_location FROM compliance_entities;
SELECT record_id, check_id, entity_id, compliance_date FROM compliance_records;
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks ORDER BY check_name ASC, regulation_id DESC;
SELECT check_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_checks WHERE regulation_id = 1 AND compliance_status = TRUE;

SELECT cc.check_name, cr.compliance_date, ce.entity_name FROM compliance_records cr JOIN compliance_checks cc ON cc.check_id = cr.check_id JOIN compliance_entities ce ON ce.entity_id = cr.entity_id WHERE cr.compliance_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT ce.entity_name, cc.check_name, cc.check_description, cr.compliance_date FROM compliance_entities ce JOIN compliance_records cr ON cr.entity_id = ce.entity_id JOIN compliance_checks cc ON cc.check_id = cr.check_id WHERE cc.compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY cr.compliance_date DESC;

SELECT cr.record_id, cc.check_name, ce.entity_name FROM compliance_records cr JOIN compliance_checks cc ON cc.check_id = cr.check_id JOIN compliance_entities ce ON ce.entity_id = cr.entity_id WHERE cc.check_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY cr.record_id DESC;
